item.description:

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @dino1001 dino1001
item.description:
@dino1001 wrote:

1

				else if(useItemID == 5297 && atObjectID == 8050){//Irit Seed
				if(playerLevel [19] >= 47) { //farming bigger than 47
				setAnimation(827);
				deleteItem(5297, getItemSlot(5297), 1); 
				addItem(259, 2);
				addSkillXP(400, 19);
				sendMessage("You grow a herb");
				} else if(playerLevel[19] < 47) {
				sendMessage("You need a farming level of 47 to grow this!");
				}
				
				} else if(useItemID == 5298 && atObjectID == 8050){//Avantoe Seed
				if(playerLevel [19] >= 55) {
				setAnimation(827);
				deleteItem(5298, getItemSlot(5298), 1); 
				addItem(261, 2);
				addSkillXP(450, 19);
				sendMessage("You grow a herb");
				} else if(playerLevel[19] <=55) {
				sendMessage("You need a farming level of 55 to grow this!");
				}
				
				} else if(useItemID == 5299 && atObjectID == 8050){//Kwuarm Seed
				if(playerLevel [19] >= 61) {
				setAnimation(827);
				deleteItem(5299, getItemSlot(5299), 1); 
				addItem(263, 2);
				addSkillXP(500, 19);
				sendMessage("You grow a herb");
				} else if(playerLevel[19] < 61) {
				sendMessage("You need a farming level of 61 to grow this!");
				}

				) else if(useItemID == 5300 && atObjectID == 8050){//Snapdragon Seed
				if(playerLevel [19] >= 66) {
				setAnimation(827);
				deleteItem(5300, getItemSlot(5300), 1); 
				addItem(3000, 2);
				addSkillXP(550, 19);
				sendMessage("You grow a herb");
				} else if(playerLevel[19] < 66) {
				sendMessage("You need a farming level of 66 to grow this!");
				}

				} else if(useItemID == 5301 && atObjectID == 8050){//Cadantine Seed
				if(playerLevel [19] >= 73) {
				setAnimation(827);
				deleteItem(5301, getItemSlot(5301), 1); 
				addItem(265, 2);
				addSkillXP(600, 19);
				sendMessage("You grow a herb");
				} else if(playerLevel[19] < 73) {
				sendMessage("You need a farming level of 73 to grow this!");
				}

				} else if(useItemID == 5302 && atObjectID == 8050){//Lantadyme Seed
				if(playerLevel [19] >= 79) {
				setAnimation(827);
				deleteItem(5302, getItemSlot(5302), 1); 
				addItem(2481, 2);
				addSkillXP(550, 19);
				sendMessage("You grow a herb");
				} else if(playerLevel[19] < 79) {
				sendMessage("You need a farming level of 79 to grow this!");
				}


				} else if(useItemID == 5303 && atObjectID == 8050){//Dwarf Weed Seed
				if(playerLevel [19] >= 87) {
				setAnimation(827);
				deleteItem(5303, getItemSlot(5303), 1); 
				addItem(267, 2);
				addSkillXP(600, 19);
				sendMessage("You grow a herb");
				} else if(playerLevel[19] < 87) {
				sendMessage("You need a farming level of 87 to grow this!");
				}

				} else if(useItemID == 5304 && atObjectID == 8050){//Torstol Seed
				if(playerLevel [19] >= 92) {
				setAnimation(827);
				deleteItem(5304, getItemSlot(5304), 1); 
				addItem(269, 2);
				addSkillXP(600, 19);
				sendMessage("You grow a herb");
				} else if(playerLevel[19] < 91) {
				sendMessage("You need a farming level of 92 to grow this!");
				}
				}

2 will do soon

3 replace your wind strike with this

if(magicID == 1152) // Wind strike{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 1){
if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==false)){
plr.sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}

else if((playerHasItemAmount(558, 1)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(556, 1)==true))
{
//offsetY = (absY - EnemyY2) * -1;
//offsetX = (absX - EnemyX2) * -1;
//GraphicsHandler.plr.addSpell(90, absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 160, 91, 43, 31, 92, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
hitDiff = 1 + misc.random(6);
inCombat();
stillgfx(92, EnemyY2, EnemyX2);
//PkingDelay = 15;
setAnimation(711);
addSkillXP((15*plr.playerLevel[6]), 6);
deleteItem(558, plr.getItemSlot(558), 1); 
deleteItem(556, plr.getItemSlot(556), 1);   
teleportToX = plr.absX;
teleportToY = plr.absY;
//castOnplayer.currentHealth -= castOnplayer.hitDiff;
}
}

and repeat for each spell

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

Ok i’ll start off with this one

  1. All of these work

[code] else if(useItemID == 5291 && atObjectID == 8050)//Guam Seed
{
setAnimation(827);
deleteItem(5291, getItemSlot(5291), 1);
addItem(249, 1);
addSkillXP(100, 19);
sendMessage(“You grow a herb”);
}

			else if(useItemID == 5292 && atObjectID == 8050){//marrentill seed
			if(playerLevel [19] >= 11) {
			setAnimation(827);
			deleteItem(5292, getItemSlot(5292), 1); 
			addItem(251, 2);
			addSkillXP(150, 19);
			sendMessage("You grow a herb");
			} else if(playerLevel[19] <=10) {

			}
			}

			else if(useItemID == 5293 && atObjectID == 8050){//Tarromin seed

			addSkillXP(200, 19);
			sendMessage("You grow a herb");

			}
			}

			else if(useItemID == 5296 && atObjectID == 8050)//ToadFlax seed
			if(playerLevel [19] >= 40) {

			deleteItem(5296, getItemSlot(5296), 1); 
			addItem(2998, 2);
			addSkillXP(350, 19);
			sendMessage("You grow a herb");
			} else if(playerLevel[19] <=39) {

			}[/code]

These don’t

[code] else if(useItemID == 5297 && atObjectID == 8050)//Irit Seed
if(playerLevel [19] >= 47) {
setAnimation(827);
deleteItem(5297, getItemSlot(5297), 1);
addItem(259, 2);
addSkillXP(400, 19);
sendMessage(“You grow a herb”);
} else if(playerLevel[19] <=46) {

}

			else if(useItemID == 5298 && atObjectID == 8050)//Avantoe Seed

I’ve thought about this a little bit. Ok see i thought u needed 2 of these after each one “}”. But I tryed Toadflax without it. And it worked. But the problem is i try just adding a } to the ones that don’t work and i get an error.

  1. I gave my source to my brother so he could work on it. Since my name is Ultima and his name is Wolfshui, i had made all commands only be used by me, Ultima. But when he changed everything from Ultima to Wolfshui and he does the command in the game. He either gets kicked, but usually gets banned. And yes he has player rights just like me.

  2. How do i make it where mage spells require levels and runes? If anyone has made or know of a tut on it, please notify me on here by simply posting

I’m going to bed so if anyone wants to reply they’re thoughts or anything they want about this because im not going to be bumping it. Night all.

Thanks.
